titleStmt.title: The wonderfull vvoorkmanship of the world wherin is conteined an excellent discourse of Christian naturall philosophie, concernyng the fourme, knowledge, and vse of all thinges created: specially gathered out of the fountaines of holy Scripture, by Lambertus Danæus: and now Englished, by T.T.
Physica Christiana. English
titleStmt.author: Daneau, Lambert, ca. 1530-1595?
Twyne, Thomas, 1543-1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By John Kingston] for Andrew Maunsell, in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Parret,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An excellent discourse of Christian naturall philosophie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
